ResearchProjectDef.label: recurve bow
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced construction techniques allow for production of the recurve bow, an effective and inexpensive ranged weapon.

ResearchProjectDef.label: pemmican
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make pemmican, a preserved mixture of meat and plant matter that doesn't go bad for a long time. Great for traveling.

ResearchProjectDef.label: passive cooler
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make passive coolers, a way to cool indoor spaces without using electricity.

ResearchProjectDef.label: devilstrand
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to plant devilstrand, a slow-growing mushroom that yields a valuable plant fiber.

ResearchProjectDef.label: psychoid brewing
ResearchProjectDef.description: With preparation, psychoid leaves can be boiled in water, producing a mildly euphoric and addictive tea.

ResearchProjectDef.label: brewing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build a brewery to transform hops into tasty, tasty beer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: carpet making
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build carpets to increase the quality of their environments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: smithing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build smithies for crafting metal weapons and tools.\n\nAllows you to craft simple weapons like knives, gladii, and maces.

ResearchProjectDef.label: stonecutting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build stonecutting tables, which allow you to refine rock chunks into stone blocks that can be used for construction.

ResearchProjectDef.label: complex clothing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Sew complicated garments like pants, dusters, and cowboy hats.

ResearchProjectDef.label: drug production
ResearchProjectDef.description: The basics of drug preparation and synthesis. Allows creation of the drug lab. Further research is required to make specific drugs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: electricity
ResearchProjectDef.description: Generate and use electricity for cooking and other simple tasks.
